title: Second Life: I Will Be the Best in This Second Life! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Martial Arts   School Life   Supernatural
author: ปากกาขนดำ
description: Suriya, who was unfortunate enough to die because of a short circuit, have to live his life in a body of a plain, and poor high-school student. He promises that if he isn't the best in this life then we will see!>
